name: markpage
description: Build and manage markdown-based content with distributed navigation - framework agnostic content management system

scripts.build: npx --yes esbuild src/index.ts src/marked.ts src/builder/index.ts src/renderer/index.ts src/renderer/content.ts src/renderer/navigation.ts src/builder/builder.ts src/builder/parser.ts src/types.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --sourcemap --outdir=dist --format=esm --external:marked && npx --yes esbuild src/index.ts src/marked.ts src/builder/index.ts src/renderer/index.ts src/renderer/content.ts src/renderer/navigation.ts src/builder/builder.ts src/builder/parser.ts src/types.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --sourcemap --outdir=dist --format=cjs --out-extension:.js=.cjs --external:marked
scripts.dev: npm run build && chokidar 'src/**/*.ts' -c 'npm run build'
